title: Why do all the pros still build tank/triforce ekko?
body: Didn't his scalings get buffed into oblivion and his base damage nerfed a lot, so why are pros still building tanky triforce builds? Is Tannky triforce still better?

replies.body: Because it's safe. The same reason Vladimir statistically sucks but high ELO players make it work.

{{champion:245}} can reliably proc {{item:3078}} whenever it is up late game.  This really ups his damage.  It's like {{champion:39}} actually.  Usually she builds {{item:3078}} then full tank.  However, {{champion:245}}'s cool down on Q the way it is allows him to abuse {{item:3078}} way better than her even.  She also doesn't have his AoE stun (her's is easier to land though) nor does she have the safety / mobility of his ultimate.  He also has a slow (his Q, passive, and W), percent health damage, a dash and blink.  {{champion:39}} does have a resetting Dash though.

because hes still broken as fuck with fervor and triforce.

its ekko. he will never not be broken. riot has no idea hwo to truly balance him.
